mapper.select: SELECT ap.id , b.menu_id, ap.menu_name `text` FROM (SELECT * FROM `user` WHERE flag = 1 AND username = #{username}) a LEFT JOIN role_app_auth b ON a.user_role = b.role_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM app_menu WHERE menu_flag = 1) ap ON b.menu_id = ap.id
SELECT no.id, no.menu_id, no.node_name `text`, no.node_route route FROM (SELECT * FROM app_menu WHERE menu_flag = 1) ap LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM app_node WHERE node_flag = 1) no ON ap.id = no.menu_id
